sequence:
Gentle and Sweet Ooshio!

<size=45>Fate or Miracle?</size>

scripts.say: Port - Office
I finished my work for the morning and was taking some sweet time to relax.
I done made some handmade sweets for ya, Commander~ Hope you'll like 'em~
They've got less sugar in 'em since I'm conscious 'bout yer health~
Ooshio left a small box right in front of me. Opening it revealed appetizing biscuits and cookies in various shapes, all lined up nicely inside.
Oh, almost forgot to say: ya only get half of 'em. Be nice 'n leave the rest, will ya?
Only half of it?
Who's gettin' the rest? Hehehe, come along 'n you'll find out who~
Being curious, I decided to follow Ooshio.
We're here, Commander~
Howdy, Shigure, it's me~
The place Ooshio had taken me to was a room in the Sakura Empire's dormitory.
Oh, it's you! Hehe, I was gonna show you my new nails today, and... Huh, looks like the Commander's here too.
Yup♪ Told me, "I'm curious who's getting these snacks," so we went here together~
Huh, I see. Yuudachi's still sleeping, though.
Still sleepin', huh? Then I reckon I oughta show ya my secret trick for wakin' someone up~
Yuudachi was sleeping soundly on her futon. Ooshio opened the box and took out a biscuit which she put on Yuudachi's nose.
*Sniff, sniff*... Woof! I smell snacks! Where?! Where are the snacks?!
Μornin', Yuudachi~ I done gotten you some snacks~
W-wait, you mean...?!
Your handmade snacks! Awoooo! I'm as awake as a Pillar Man! Gimme those snacks, right now!
Yuudachi was as excited as a dog seeing its owner come home when she started munching on Ooshio's snacks.
Ya don't gotta eat it all at once~ There's still plenty left~
Those two share some kind of strange fate... But I'm sure that's nothing you need to worry about, Commander.
Hey now, Shigure, don't say that kinda misleadin' stuff to the Commander~
